page.title: 14Events in Little Sodbury.
page.content: There are not many events in the Little Sodbury area.But the residents do join up with Horton for a fun run which takes place in May,a bonfire night which is in November,and their fete which is in March.They also hold a barn-dance in April.In the evenings they may watch television and sometimes they will go out in their cars.Sometimes people go in the fields to play cricket.On some evenings they will stay in and play cards and board games.At Christmas time most people stay at home and entertain their family.Some peolpe also stay at home and do gardening,and some people go on long walks.It is a quiet village and there are not many organised clubs and societes.Not very many people live in the area.
